verbs.description: [ARG1: The Israeli prime minister 's address] [V: comes] [ARGM-TMP: 12 days before President Donald Trump 's deadline for amending the Iran nuclear deal or walking away from it] .
The Israeli prime minister 's address comes 12 days before President Donald Trump 's deadline for [V: amending] [ARG1: the Iran nuclear deal] or walking away from it .
The Israeli prime minister 's address comes 12 days before President Donald Trump 's deadline for amending the Iran nuclear deal or [V: walking] [ARGM-DIR: away from it] .
